mainEntity.name: What are NFTs and how do they benefit indie hackers?

acceptedAnswer.text: NFTs, or non-fungible tokens, provide a decentralized platform that allows indie hackers to create and monetize digital content without being constrained by traditional gatekeepers. This fosters innovation and financial independence.

mainEntity.name: How did a digital artist succeed using NFTs?

acceptedAnswer.text: A digital artist leveraged NFTs to directly reach a global audience, bypassing traditional art gatekeepers and gaining financial independence. This is explored in [their journey](https://example.com/nft-digital-artist-story).

mainEntity.name: What was the impact of NFTs on an indie game developer?

acceptedAnswer.text: An indie game developer redefined gaming economics through NFTs, allowing players to have true ownership of in-game assets, leading to a successful project discussed in [how they achieved success](https://example.com/nft-game-developer-story).

mainEntity.name: How did an indie musician use NFTs?

acceptedAnswer.text: An indie musician released limited-edition albums via NFTs, offering exclusive content and creating a sustainable income stream independent of record labels. The process can be read in [their innovative approach](https://example.com/nft-musician-story).

mainEntity.name: What is the story behind the NFT-powered fashion line?

acceptedAnswer.text: A fashion designer launched an NFT-powered collection that connected virtual and physical fashion, targeting a tech-forward audience, as detailed in [their creative use of NFTs](https://example.com/nft-fashion-line-story).

mainEntity.name: How do NFTs empower creative independence?

acceptedAnswer.text: NFTs enable indie hackers to disrupt industries and gain financial independence.
